ruling: - You cannot activate [[Pot of Avarice]] while [[Transmigration Break]] is active.
- You can activate [[Cyberdark Impact!]] while [[Transmigration Break]] is active, but the "Cyberdark" Monsters are removed from play instead of being returned to the Deck.
- If an effect would return a Fusion Monster in the Graveyard to its owner's hand or Fusion Deck, the Fusion Monster is removed from play instead.
